description: We used CheAs and biotin-CheZ to validate the efficiency of SPIDER capturing protein-protein interaction. Pupylation sites on WT CheAs after SPIDER assay was identified by LC-MS/MS analysis, by searching for an additional mass of ~243 Da, which represents the three C-terminal residues of Pup, i. e., GGE, that covalently binds to adjacent lysine by pupylation. ）

modifications.name: No PTMs are included in the dataset

title: CheA pupylation sites identified by SPIDER assay
